name: Greenhouse SpaceStation
description:
I made this space station for my first October Spook Space Jam since I couldn't find a lot of space stations that I could use as a level for my player.

It includes the original blend file (made in 3.2.1), as well as an exported fbx file. There are no textures, but the blend file does include materials on most things, and the model is mirrored. So it shouldn't be too difficult to add what you want to it.

If you find this useful, and you use it in one of your games, drop me a link. I'd love to play it.

CC0 license, use it however you want, modify it, no attribution required, although I do always appreciate attributions if you feel like it.
